item.title: Application File
item.description: Application File I’m currently looking for an intership on summer 2023. Being passionate about CyberSecurity and Computer Networks I mostly candite for jobs in these two domains. Many big companies propose internship in those, here is an exmaple of my application for a job at Airbus. You can find the job ad here. You can find my application letter here. You can find my CV here. Yan can find my linkedin profile here.
